actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance, to otherwise improve the educational assistance program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the rates of educational assistance benefits payable to veterans. Provides that such rates shall be recomputed at the beginning of each fiscal year to reflect any increase in the Consumer Price Index published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance, to otherwise improve the educational assistance program, and for other purposes.
